name: Leppard
overview: An action game from Harald Sprung and published in Magic Disk 64 1996/01. Leppard is a diamond collecting robot. In order to get from one level to the next, he has to show twenty diamonds - not an easy task, since in addition to the sparkling stones there are also four malicious opponents in the labyrinth who only have one thing in mind: to touch Leppard so that he evaporated in a big green cloud. Leppard is controlled through a total of ten levels with one opponent, but he not only has the four villains already mentioned, but also a sometimes very tight time limit. In order to at least defend himself against the numerous opponents, Leppard can plant a bomb at the push of a button. However, this can only be done standing up. Who is able to release the fuse of such a dangerous object in a full sprint? However, you have to be particularly careful, because enemies that have been blown up will return to the field in a few moments!
